text: Hey folks - trying to set up a macro that creates 2 rich text block widgets and wondering if it is possible to name them through the arguments when you reference the macro. Currently the widget name needs to be in quotations but there doesnt seem to be a way to insert the macro argument as the name. Does this make sense?
has anybody tried using the `crm_object` function to retrieve a shopify product?
i know it can be done.
